1.title: Basic PHP and SQL Project 1: Simple CRUD Application
1.task: Create a simple CRUD application with PHP and MySQL, implementing basic database operations.

2.title: Basic PHP and SQL Project 2: User Registration and Login
2.task: Implement a user registration and login system using PHP, MySQL, and form validation.

3.title: PHP+SQL Project 1: To-Do List Application
3.task: Build a to-do list app with PHP, MySQL for data storage, and basic front-end integration.

4.title: PHP+SQL Project 2: Blog with Categories and Comments
4.task: Create a blog with categories, posts, and comment functionality, using PHP and MySQL.

5.title: PHP+SQL Project 3: Inventory Management System
5.task: Build an inventory management system with PHP, MySQL for database, and dynamic inventory updates.

6.title: PHP+SQL Project 4: Employee Management System
6.task: Develop an employee management system, managing employee data, departments, and roles using PHP and MySQL.

7.title: PHP+SQL Project 5: Simple E-Commerce Site
7.task: Create a simple e-commerce website with PHP, MySQL, product listing, shopping cart, and order functionality.

8.title: PHP+SQL Project 6: Event Management System
8.task: Build an event management system with event creation, ticket booking, and user management features.

9.title: Advanced PHP+SQL Project 1: Multi-User Blog
9.task: Develop a multi-user blog system where users can create accounts, post blogs, and comment on posts.

10.title: Advanced PHP+SQL Project 2: Job Portal
10.task: Create a job portal where employers can post job openings and applicants can apply with their profiles.

11.title: Advanced PHP+SQL Project 3: Online Quiz System
11.task: Develop an online quiz system where users can take quizzes, view results, and track their scores.

12.title: Laravel Project 1: Basic Blog with Authentication
12.task: Create a simple blog application using Laravel with user authentication and basic post management.

13.title: Laravel Project 2: Task Management Application
13.task: Build a task management app using Laravel, allowing users to create, edit, and delete tasks.

14.title: Laravel Project 3: E-commerce with Cart Functionality
14.task: Develop an e-commerce site using Laravel with product listing, cart, and checkout functionality.

15.title: Symfony Project 1: Basic CRUD Application
15.task: Create a basic CRUD application using Symfony, with user-friendly interfaces and forms.

16.title: Symfony Project 2: Blog with Categories and Comments
16.task: Build a blog with Symfony, including categories, posts, and comment management.

17.title: Symfony Project 3: Job Portal
17.task: Develop a job portal with Symfony, allowing job listings and applicant profiles.

18.title: WordPress Custom Theme Development
18.task: Build a custom WordPress theme, understanding the template hierarchy, functions, and customizations.

19.title: WordPress Plugin Development
19.task: Create a custom WordPress plugin that adds specific functionality (e.g., a custom post type or widget).

20.title: WordPress Gutenberg Block Development
20.task: Create custom blocks in the Gutenberg editor using JavaScript and PHP.
